notes.title: Data availability
notes.p: The AMIP5/CMIP5 data are available from the Coupled Model Inter-comparison Project archive. The HadGEM3-GC2 and HadGEM3-GC3.1 present day control experiment and associated stand-alone atmosphere experiment data are available from Met Office on reasonable request. All of the observational datasets are publically available (see associated references for details).
